name: Look Upon My Works, Ye Mighty

system.description: At 10th level, you automatically gain an average tier 4 Stronghold or a luxurious tier 3 stronghold.  In addition, the gold and time required to build/upgrade a stronghold under your supervision is cut in half.  You may only supervise the construction or expansion of a single stronghold at a time, and although you do not need to be physically present for the full building of it, you do need to visit the build site and check in at least once a month.
